cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 415 mi (665 km) ENE of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn west-southwest on Tuesday, moving toward the northwestern Bahamas, then tracking westward toward the east-central Florida coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (roughly between the Volusia/Brevard County Line and North Palm Beach)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Volusia/Brevard County Line FL south to Hallandale Beach FL and Lake Okeechobee; Tropical Storm Watch: Hallandale Beach FL to north of Ocean Reef FL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Northwest Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning: Andros Island and Hallandale Beach FL north to Altamaha Sound GA (incl. Lake Okeechobee); Storm-Surge Warning: North Palm Beach FL to Altamaha Sound GA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas and much of the southeast U.S. coast from Florida to the Carolinas/Georgia
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (San Juan not listed in wind-probability table)
